channel.title: 2021 on Alicia Guo
channel.description: Recent content in 2021 on Alicia Guo

item.title: life's little gifts üçÉ
item.description: from life to me to you :) 12-27-22 When it’s cold in Texas all of the shrubs get blankets. 12-25-22 Being released from quarantine for the holidays is a blessing. I am so grateful for the mundane. Of being able to eat meals with my parents and coexist in the same spaces. 4-19-22 Orchid mantis! A mantis that looks like an orchid! They exist!

item.title: entering a liminal space
item.description: december 2021 - january 2022 “take note of the things that touch your heart, then you will know what you like” - Blue Period 1-21-22 I‚Äôm sitting on a plane to LA - in a liminal space within a larger liminal time. On the precipice of a new destination, but not quite there yet. Traveling. Questioning. The past two months were ones of reflection and searching for the things that touch my heart.
